mapper.select: SELECT USERINFO_SEQ, USERINFO_CONTROLNO, USERINFO_NAME, USERINFO_NICKNAME, USERINFO_ID, USERINFO_PASSWORD, USERINFO_SEX, USERINFO_AGE, USERINFO_PHONNUMBER, USERINFO_EMAIL,USERINFO_SIGNDATE, USERINFO_ENABLE, USERINFO_CACHE FROM USERINFO WHERE USERINFO_ID = #{userinfo_id} AND USERINFO_PASSWORD = #{userinfo_password}
